pkgmetadata.longdescription: Independence Tests for Two-Way, Three-Way and Four-Way Contingency Tables // Presentation two independence tests for two-way, three-way and four-way contingency tables. These tests are: the modular test and the logarithmic minimum test. For details on this method see: Sulewski (2017) doi:10.18778/0208-6018.330.04, Sulewski (2018) doi:10.1080/02664763.2018.1424122, Sulewski (2019) doi:10.2478/bile-2019-0003, Sulewski (2021) doi:10.1080/00949655.2021.1908286.
